posts.post_title: FS: t206 Cobbs and Johnsons ~ Youngs added, SGC graded
posts.post_content:
Following are for sale:

Check, MO or paypal gift.

email only to purchase or with questions...I have lots of other SGC graded cards, and HOFers, if you want to send me a list of some kind.

thanks - Rob
[url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]

Cobb, red - SGC 60 - $2750
Cobb, bat off, SGC 50 - $1750  SOLD
Cobb, bat on, SGC 40 - $1475  SOLD

Johnson, port - SGC 50 - $1425
Johnson, hands chest - SGC 60 - $1850 very nice card

Young, glove - SGC 40 - $625
Young, port - SGC 20 - $465 SOLD
Young, no glove - SGC 20 - $375

I cant seem to upload the Johnson card, so you can email me to get one and the Young cards.
Great cards Rob, good luck with the sale.  They won't last long
Email sent on Young (Port, Glove) and Johnson (Chest).  Thanks!
some nice cards left, will entertain offers
